AD_AngryBrother.synopsis: Lia died in Moonrise. Upon his return to Last Light, Cal and Rolan had a massive argument that the player failed to dispel. Cal, upset, walked away from Rolan and now stands on the balcony. He's upset, grieving, and wishing he had died instead of his sister.
AD_AngryBrother.how_to_trigger: Fail to calm the argument between Cal and Rolan should Lia die in the Moonrise prisoner rescue.

Rolan.synopsis: Rolan is an apprentice wizard whose siblings were recently captured by cultists. He's stuck in a tavern in the middle of the cursed lands where they were taken, drinking heavily, blaming himself for their loss. When he sees the players, he turns his frustration onto them - he's only here because they convinced him to stay with the other tieflings who were captured in the first place.Rolan is in fact the only reason any of the tieflings are still alive, having protected them from the traitorous Zevlor, who planned to give them over to the cult. He doesn't feel like a hero though - he feels like a failure.
Rolan.how_to_trigger: Talk to the prodigy in Haven. Will also trigger if you talk to Ide/Umi when they are near him. Only occurs if the player has helped tieflings in Act 1 and convinced Rolan to escort them.

AD_RolanReturns.synopsis: A one off AD that triggers when the siblings return and spot each other in haven. In this version cal and/or lia are waiting in Last light when rolan returns.
AD_RolanReturns.how_to_trigger: Rolan returns to Haven while his sibligns are already waiting for him. Variation for being with only cal, only lia, or both siblings.

Hologram.synopsis: Rolan has left a message behind in Haven, for his siblings. This is a small automated hologram that is fixed to the bar counter. It plays a message (that he's gone looking for his siblings or that he's dead) when the player interacts with it.
Hologram.how_to_trigger: Rolan leaves Haven. This is left on the bar counter.

Ide.synopsis: Ide mainly talks about the interaction the player can have with Rolan in his dialog (HAV_ProdigyLament_Rolan), where he berates the kid for not giving him more alcohol. This dialog continues that narrative beat, and players can acquire a book Ide was planning to give Rolan.
Ide.how_to_trigger: Load SCL levelDebugBook Act02 After CheckpointRecon : teleport S_DEN_Trainee_002Talk to Rolan and end the dialogue (Ide will flee)Find Ide again using teleport S_DEN_Trainee_002 in recon (she is in a room nearby)Interact with her

AD_AfterReunion.synopsis: Cal and/or Lia has been rescued from Moonrise. They have reunited with Rolan and are reminscing/checking up on one another. This occurs after the reunion scene.
AD_AfterReunion.how_to_trigger: After the prodigy siblings reunion. Variation for being with only cal, only lia, or both siblings.

AD_BeforeReunion.synopsis: This AD covers the following scenarios: Lia alive, Cal dead. Cal alive, Lia dead. Cal, Lia and Rolan all alive and well. This AD occurs after the player has rescued Cal and/ or Lia from Moonrise towers, but BEFORE the player triggers the reunion scene in Last Light. The siblings are standing together and arguing.
AD_BeforeReunion.how_to_trigger: Trigger Moonrise prison escape. These ADs play once available characters have returned to last light, but before the reunion scene plays.

Reunion.synopsis: Cal and/or Lia have been rescued from Moonrise towers and reunited with Rolan in Last Light Inn. It is initially a tense scene - Rolan was worried sick/is angry one of his siblings is dead and is taking it out on his family. It is up to the player to calm them down and remind them of what is important - family.
Reunion.how_to_trigger: Player rescues cal and/or lia from Moonrise Towers. They end up in Last Light in where they have a reunion scene with their brother Rolan. Rolan must be present in Last Light for this to trigger.

AD_BrotherWaitingAlone.synopsis: Cal has been rescued from Moonrise towers prison by the player and is now in Last Light Inn. His sister Lia is dead and his brother Rolan is nowhere to be found (but he left a message telling Cal to wait for his return). Cal is talking to himself here. He's nervous, scared for Rolan and grieving Lia.
AD_BrotherWaitingAlone.how_to_trigger: Enter Moonrise (Rolan will leave Last Light), cntrl+k Lia, do the prison escape.

AD_SiblingsReturn.synopsis: A one off AD that occurs when Lia and/or Cal spot Rolan upon entering Last Light after being rescued from Moonrise.
AD_SiblingsReturn.how_to_trigger: Siblings return to Haven and Rolan is waiting for them there. Variation for being with only cal, only lia, or both siblings.

AD_WaitingForRolan.synopsis: The player has rescued Cal and Lia from Moonrise Towers. Upon their arrival in Last Light, they find a message from Rolan telling them to stay put and wait for him. They are worried for their brother and discussing what to do.
AD_WaitingForRolan.how_to_trigger: Jailbreak occurs but Rolan was never rescued by player. Siblings await him at the bar.

PAD_HologramReaction.synopsis: PAD for after players see Rolan's hologram in the Last Light Inn for the first time. They comment on needing to go save Rolan as he won't be able to shadow creatures on his own.

AD_RolanAndKid.synopsis: Roland and Umi are standing at the bar. Umi is behind the bar and Roland is badgering Umi to serve him more alcohol. Roland is extremely drunk and belligerent, and Umi is trying to calm him down.
AD_RolanAndKid.how_to_trigger: Roland and Umi at the bar in Haven. Tieflings must have been saved from the goblins in act 1 and Rolan convinced to help them.

Umi.synopsis: Umi is young boy in the Haven. He spends most of his time hunting for valuable items in the Inn. He really looks up to the boss of his crew, Mol. This dialogue covers all his main states in Haven, including isobel and mol's kidnapping, when haven is left unprotected, when it's being attacked etc.

Brother.synopsis: Cal has been rescued from Moonrise Towers by the player and is now in Last Light. This dialogue covers multiple states: Rolan is missing, Rolan is dead, Rolan and Cal had a fight (player must pass a persuade to calm the fight, pass and fail states here), and a general state for when cal, lia and rolan are all alive and well and cal is grateful to the player.
Brother.how_to_trigger: Recon : loadlevel SCL_Main_ADebugBook : Act2 --> Tiefling PathDebugBook : Region --> Act2 --> Haven --> After CheckpointOthers : Walk to the barRecon : oe rolanleaveshaven (if you want to do rolan is missing one-liners)Recon : oe prisonersreturn (for cal and lia to return to last light)Recon : SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Prodigy_State_Dead (optional for dead path)Others : Talk to CalResuce Cal and/or Lia from Moonrise towers (this dialogue includes solo versions for if Lia died in Moonrise), then speak to Cal in Last Light. If Rolan is present, the reunion dialogue will play first.

AD_SisterWaitingAlone.how_to_trigger: Lia is waiting for Rolan in Haven, alone.

AD_BartendingKids.synopsis: Two kids are playing bartender in the bar of an abandoned inn. They're having fun initially, but after an attack on the town they start to get worried and are more downbeat.
AD_BartendingKids.how_to_trigger: Roland and Umi at the bar in Haven. Tieflings must have been saved from the goblins in act 1 and Rolan convinced to help them.

Sister.synopsis: Lia has been rescued from Moonrise Towers by the player and is now in Last Light. This dialogue covers multiple states: Rolan is missing, Rolan is dead, Rolan and Lia had a fight (player must pass a persuade to calm the fight, pass and fail states here), and a general state for when cal, lia and rolan are all alive and well and Lia is grateful to the player.
Sister.how_to_trigger: Recon : loadlevel SCL_Main_ADebugBook : Act2 --> Tiefling PathDebugBook : Region --> Act2 --> Haven --> After CheckpointOthers : Walk to the barRecon : oe rolanleaveshaven (and wait a bit - optional for dead path)Recon : oe prisonersreturn (and wait a bit)Recon : SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Prodigy_State_Dead (optional for dead path)Others : Talk to Lia---Resuce Cal and/or Lia from Moonrise towers (this dialogue includes solo versions for if Cal died in Moonrise), then speak to Lia in Last Light. If Rolan is present, the reunion dialogue will play first.

AD_AngrySister.synopsis: Cal died in Moonrise. Lia arrived back in Last Light and has a fight with Rolan about it, which the player failed to dispel. Lia stormed off and now stands alone on the balcony. She is furious and grieving.
AD_AngrySister.how_to_trigger: Cal dies in Moonrise. Lia and Rolan have a fight about it in Last Light and player chooses/fails to calm them down.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Several session dialogs are linked by cause‐and‐effect relationships. For example, the AD_BeforeReunion scene is meant to occur once the player has rescued Cal and/or Lia from Moonrise Towers but before the reunion scene itself. Once the Reunion scene happens in Last Light, additional dialogs such as AD_AfterReunion follow. Similarly, when Rolan leaves Haven he leaves a Hologram message – which then cues a PAD_HologramReaction once the player sees it. In another branch, when both siblings are rescued but Rolan is still missing, the player encounters AD_WaitingForRolan (a message indicating Rolan is delayed). Later, if Rolan eventually returns while the siblings are still waiting (or upon their re‐entry into Haven), the AD_RolanReturns session is triggered. In addition, certain episodes are mutually exclusive because they depend on which sibling dies in Moonrise. For instance, AD_AngryBrother (triggered when Lia dies, leaving Cal grieving/angry) cannot coexist with AD_AngrySister (triggered when Cal dies). Similarly, when only one sibling survives and waits alone for Rolan, the sessions AD_BrotherWaitingAlone (when Cal is alone because Lia died) and AD_SisterWaitingAlone (when Lia is alone because Cal died) cannot both occur in the same playthrough.
